short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates an easy way to view Yelp reviews for the relevant OpenTable listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension that enables a user to view Yelp reviews for restaurants listed on OpenTable.

Usage is simple: You hover over the name of the restaurant you wish to get the information of from Yelp, and it shows up in a tooltip next to the name! Easy as that!

V-- 1.0.1 Modified permissions and setup server properly
